name: Cheesy Hash Brown Patties
ingredients: 2 tablespoons onion, very finely minced (about 3/4 ounce)

instructions.en: Mix shredded cauliflower, minced onion, egg, shredded mozzarella, salt, and pepper well in a bowl
instructions.sk: V miske dobre zmiešajte nastrúhaný karfiol, nadrobno nasekanú cibuľu, vajce, nastrúhanú mozzarellu, soľ a korenie
instructions.ja: ボウルですりおろしたカリフラワー、みじん切りの玉ねぎ、卵、シュレッドモッツァレラ、塩、コショウをよく混ぜる

instructions.en: Grease a muffin top pan with butter
instructions.ja: マフィントップパンにバターを塗る

instructions.en: Pat the mixture evenly into the greased muffin top pan
instructions.sk: Zmes rovnomerne rozotrite do vymastenej formy na muffiny
instructions.ja: 混ぜた材料をバターを塗ったマフィントップパンに均等に広げる

instructions.en: Bake at 450°F (230°C) for 8-10 minutes or until crispy and brown on the bottom
instructions.sk: Pečte pri teplote 230°C 8-10 minút alebo kým nebude spodok chrumkavý a hnedý
instructions.ja: 450°F（230°C）で8〜10分、または底面がカリカリできつね色になるまで焼く

instructions.en: Flip patties over and bake for another 3-4 minutes to brown the other side
instructions.sk: Placky otočte a pečte ďalšie 3-4 minúty, aby zhnedla aj druhá strana
instructions.ja: パティをひっくり返し、さらに3〜4分焼いて反対側も焼き色をつける
